title: About Amanda
text: Amanda Iturbe is a New York City-based educator and learning specialist with over 15 years experience helping your children reach their fullest potential. Amanda specializes in helping upper-elementary, middle, and high school children with subject area content - including math and science - and organization skills, time management, and executive functioning.

title: Services and Contact
text:
I work with individuals and small groups for tutoring and coaching in Lower Manhattan and many areas of Downtown Brooklyn. I believe that the best way for children to learn is through in-person interactions and, therefore, am not taking on virtual clients at this time.
To learn more about how I can help you and your children, as well as my rates, packages, and options, please contact me by email amanda dot iturbe at gmail dot com. I am happy to setup a 15 minute consultation phone or zoom call to discuss options.
